scripts.spellcheck: for f in report/sections/**/*.tex ; do echo $f ; aspell --lang=en --mode=tex list < $f | sort | node filter.js | uniq -c ; done
scripts.dumpwords: for f in report/sections/**/*.tex ; do echo $f ; aspell --lang=en --mode=tex list < $f | sort | node filter.js | uniq >> project.dic ; done
